fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a target tonight, dealing an Unstoppable attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you target a non-Town player with your ability, you will heal yourself that night. You will be notified that this happened.
- If you target a Town player with your ability, you will also deal an Overkill attack to yourself.
- You will always shoot the player you target at night, bypassing redirections, controls, and anything else that would alter who gets shot.
- Starting on N3, you're forced to use your ability each night.
- This role can always be rerolled.
